title: Ticket #3715: Network-aware matchmaking
description:
As a part of the Lark project, Andrew is working on making matchmaking network-aware (design document to follow).

The first idea is relatively straightforward - reject matches where the transfer queue is longer than X bytes. Due to the fact that the transfer queue can include match expressions, this rejection must be done in the context of a potential machine ad - and hence in the negotiator.

As a first step, we'll need to advertise the TRANSFER_QUEUE_USER_EXPR in the schedd ad so the negotiator can access it.

For an example of a non-trivial TRANSFER_QUEUE_USER_EXPR: 

TRANSFER_QUEUE_USER_EXPR = strcat("Owner_", Owner, "-", ifThenElse(MATCH_EXP_JOBGLIDEIN_ResourceName isnt null, MATCH_EXP_JOBGLIDEIN_ResourceName, "Unknown"))
